transcript.text: *Music* *Sound of car's horn*
Guys, you really enjoyed the Reddit thread.
So after this video I scrolled through Reddit
and, man, it's awesome,  it's a gold mine ! There are threads about
about everything and nothing ! And one of them made me laugh
it is called "Crappy designs". Roughly speaking, it's everyday pictures,
of places or objects of daily life that are badly designed.
But really crappy, so wrong that we wonder how someone could have done that
without realizing that it was a mistake.
Today, we're gonna watch the best pictures of this thread, and what I like with Reddit,
is that pictures are changing  everyday, every week,
because it's based on votes. For example, if you saw that thread one week ago,
and if you come back today, you'll see new things, that's what I like.
So, I discovered Reddit after everybody,
but better later then never, as losers say.
I always say that !So, it started with that...
I'm just really baffled about what I'm suppsed to do when I'm facing that kind of situation.
Man, "Exit" sign, the kind of sign you're looking for
in case of fire, for example.
And in that case, you're feeling bad, and you're in front of the Exit sign,
you made it, you cope to save yourself !
No, no no, kid, "this door is not an exit"
It's awful. And what does it mean, "not an exit", I'm sorry
this kind of door is definitely an exit.  It may be an exit,
and someone put that sign to make people think that it's not en exit,
so, in case of fire, people die...
I'm watching too much thrillers and documentaries about psychopaths
It's not good at all. This bench is recharging mobile phones
with solar energy is put under a tree, in the shadow of a block of flats !
It's very expensive
to make that kind of bench, so put in in the sun !
"I thought we learned that when we were 4 years old"
Well, the bottom of a cup...
is round, it can't fit in a square, unless the square is bigger than the circle
but in that case it doesn't work ! Well, I must admit that it's clear that
this saucer is made for Espresso,
which is made in a very small cup, and this guy ask for a coffee,
even maybe for an American coffee, this son of a... So the waiter was sad,
because he had those saucers only, and he knew that the cup won't fit in the square.
Well, I defend anything and everything. "Orange"
What's wrong ?
OK ! I got it !
When I understand something, I put a finger in my ear. It's an orange flavoured soap.
Commonly, you put the picture of an orange on an orange flavoured soap.
But, for Halloween, they put a picture of a pumpkin, so people were confused,
and they thought that it was "pumpkin flavoured", but it was orange flavoured.
When we see a fruit or a vegetable on a product, we imagine that
the product smells like the fruit or the vegetable that we see.
I'm making a thesis about soap !
Clement, we need a vacation !
Dreadfull, man, they put
a fucking post in front of his door !
That's incredible... If he's smart, he can become very strong,
in one year. He sets a goal :
everytime I go out or I come home, I grab the pole perpendiculary, like a flag,  for 10 seconds.
And it's done ! You're muscular
at the end of the year ! With a bonus...It's really dreadfull.
"It's great"
Stop it. You, manufacturers,
stop making spin-off products
with your ass ! They had to be done by hand, not with your ass !
Asses can't make them right, I swear it.
"The sensor placement in that bathroom". Ah, it's too far, so
you have to move your hand all the time.
"Engineer" I want to study for many years,
to annoy people who use the loo. OK, there is a design issue,
but I'm gonna say something, the situation is clear, the sensor is far away and you have to put your hand in front of it
to make the water run. Sometimes, the sensor doesn't work !
You put your hand there, like a dummy, you put your hand under the water to be detected,
you pat it. It sucks ! And we don't talk about deffective sensors.
Really !
"When an American draws..." why does he have arrows and a gun ?
Man, arrows are not even in the quiver !
"How I'm supposed to read that ?"
What is that ? Why they put that here ? Ah, the article probably talks about oil,
they wanted to show what they were talking about, put they put in over the text.
Don't make books when you don't know how to do it.
"Oh, I like this magical cube !"
It's not a cube at all !
It's probably the brand, in fact. This thing is called a "HandSport".
So you wanted to joke about this product, but the packaging is clear. It's not right...
Man ! Why ? There is grass everywhere ? Why ?
It drives me crazy ! The real question is :
who put the second bench ? And which one is the second bench ?
Who's wrong ?
This one is crazy ! "Famous Asia"...
So it's a famous asian restaurant, and they put an Italian chef !
It makes no sense. And he's happy to be there !
He's supposed to represent Asia, does he have 1% of asian genes ?
No !
"Increase your ass".
"Get a better but". How can you make such a mistake with the typography ?
I's protein powder. Instead of writing that like that,
everything is readable, they wrote it like that !
It means "giant ass", which means "cul géant" [french translation]
Why is human brain so perverted ?
Even if there is a kind of testicles, it's not sexual at all.
*Laughs*
OK, look at that : it's a test to find out if your brain is perverted or not.
"The hum hum countdown". Which countdown ? Can you tell me ? I can't read it.
If you read "anal", your brain is perverted.
It is written "final", that's why the "A" on the left is bigger than the "A" on the right !
I won't lie to you : I saw it at the begginning.
"The WHAT countdown ?" * Laughs*
My words in my bond, you know it.
Guys, you put...
a "trash" side and a "recycling" side...
We easily see that there is only one bag, not two.
Don't pretend to be green, if you put a single bag ! Stop it !
We uncover you !
Oh no... Guys, you didn't think that...
OK, you wanted to show that it's a whitening toothpaste...
I understand, but putting 3 white people, together with...
"white power" beneath, it's not good !
Don't do that ! It's like making a video with politicians...
What ?
"Hey, what about putting a door to go on a...
sidewalk ?" [voice-over]"Good idea !"
It's a petanque ground in fact, not a sidewalk... I made a very bad joke, so...
But you're used to that. What's the most confusing in that picture, is that, if I saw that...
I would use the door !
I so want to open and close that thing behind me
to show that I got in. It's psychological ! You don't feel the same ?
It's awesome ! All these videos about human brain...
I made a lot of researches...
Well, well, well, Asus and Republic of gamer, this handle is not...
certified !
Is it a counterbalance for our scoliosis
we got because we sit for too long ? It is easier to carry it when the handle is
not in the middle ?
"Asus, I just built up a theory to support you, could you send me a gamer computer ? I love you."
OK, this one is crazy. You're at a party,
a friend spills his drink on you, your shoulder is wet,
but you also want to pee, and you can't dry your shoulder and pee at the same time !
What is your last hope ? It's to find that, dude !
You can dry your shoulder AND pee at the same time !
Really, it's awfull, because it means that, as you wee, someone else
is next to you, with his hands under the drying machine,
he doesn't want to bother you but he wants to dry his hands before going back to the dinner table.
It's horrible. Men, noooooooo !
One cube is missing !
So they put 2 letters in the last one ! It's terrible !
It's a very unsatisfactory picture. Guys,  we all make a contribution and we give them the last cube.
It's so sad !
Man, it's a crappy design, but it was really well done.
It's on the right place, between the eyes, there is no shading...
It's really clean ! We should all go around with a hose like this one.
Life would be better. "This base plug is brighter than the sun"
I want it ! It's awesome ! You put several of them everywhere in your room,
and if you host a party, you don't need extra lights !
The vibe is... OK, it's a crappy idea. OK, the guy is using a mobile gaming.
And it's a PG18 game, so the game...
shows a warning and ask for a parent to allow the kid to play it.
The creators had an idea, they put an interface...
"Please, confirm that your are the parent/guardian
and complete this calculation". 68 minus 59.
Like only parents could solve that, dude...
Even Natsu [the dog] could solve that ! Stop !
"The paint in this public restroom". It's awful....
It looks like a kid played with...
chocolate cake ! OK, the head shower seems to be the issue.
They put the bar on the other side ! It's genius !
I didn't know that it was possible, dude.
Dude... The hand !
The engineers of the bin joined forces with the engineers of the benches to create...
their best piece !
It's so beautiful ! You can't use the stairs in the middle,
but it's beautiful !
Congratulations guys !
It's a scandal ! The guy bought a mug,
and the shop label says "dishwasher and microwave safe".
And when he takes off the label, the manufacturer...
wrote "Not suitable for microwave".
It's bullshit, dude...
It's crazy, they are such bastards.
They really fucked off, it's serious.
On the Playstation T-shirt, the colours of...the circle, the square, the X and the triangle are not the good ones.
They flipped the colours.
The triangle is blue,
the circle is green... My heart is broken !
Delete that.
And last but not least : this one is perfect. It's a sign...
which ask to slow down because of the children playground. And they put that !
They really put that ! Men, you made that sign, but tell your children...
this is not how we operate that game ! Don't watch same without saying anything, don't consider that as normal !
If your children played like that, it's not normal ! I'm sorry to have to tell you that !
It seems that, in your mind, everybody plays like that. No !
Buddies, this is the end of this video about the thread...
"Crappy designs" on Reddit.
I really had fun, I saw many others that are great too.
If you see a crappy design in real life,
send me a picture on Twitter, think about me, I love that.
It really make me laugh, it's so funny.
A mistake without consequences always make me laugh.
It's cute, in a way.
See you soon for my next video. I will take about...
I know, and I'm gonna tell you right now. Next time, we'll talk about...
